title: Quick Grilled Corn Recipe
description: Sam the Cooking Guy shares his favorite summertime recipe, grilled corn.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/bbb-recipe/quick-grilled-corn-recipe/
Sam the Cooking Guy shares his favorite summertime recipe, grilled corn.

transcripts: Grilled corn on the cob is amazing and made much quicker with one simple change. Instead of just grilling, remove the husks from four ears of corn and wrap in cling film. Microwave on high about seven minutes or until soft. Then lightly brush with melted butter. And place on the heated grill. Your grilling time will go from about 40 minutes to about five. And when the corn is beautifully charred, simply remove, season with salt, pepper, and a little garlic powder, and look. Tremendous. Perfect grilled corn in less than a third of the time. Now that's a shortcut.
